about: Hello! I'm a Software Engineering student at Konya Technical University. I also work part-time as a full stack developer at Architecht, where I strengthen my theoretical knowledge through real-world projects. I'm constantly improving my skills in web development, focusing on user-centered, fast, and scalable solutions. I'm passionate about modern technologies and strive to apply my knowledge effectively in projects.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: With the knowledge and experience I've gained in frontend, backend, and database development, I focus on delivering end-to-end solutions in projects. I work meticulously on code quality, performance, and sustainability, continuously advancing my technical skills through teamwork and lifelong learning. By actively participating in real projects, I have the opportunity to turn theoretical knowledge into practical experience.
aboutMe.heading: Here Are Some Highlights:
aboutMe.bullet3: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap
aboutMe.bullet4: Developing Modern Web Applications with React
aboutMe.bullet5: Experience with React Hooks and Component-Based Architecture
aboutMe.bullet6: Backend Development with ASP.NET Core and MVC Framework
aboutMe.bullet7: Database Management with Microsoft SQL Server
aboutMe.bullet8: Understanding of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
aboutMe.bullet9: Experience Working with Agile and Scrum Methodologies
aboutMe.bullet10: Version Control with Git and GitHub
aboutMe.bullet11: Strong Problem-Solving and Algorithmic Thinking Skills

cert1.title: Code The Future Participation Certificate
cert1.description: I participated in the Code The Future summit, which connects students with experts in the technology sector.

cert2.title: Git and GitHub Participation Certificate
cert2.description: Completed the online training 'Version Control: Git and GitHub' organized by BTK Academy.

cert3.title: Complete Applied Web Development Course | .NET
cert3.description: Gained hands-on experience in backend and frontend integration, scalable web applications, and modern web development with ASP.NET Core, MVC, RESTful APIs, Entity Framework, and SQL Server.

cert4.title: IT Orientation Program - Developer
cert4.description: Learned about corporate software development, technology ecosystems, and workflow management in this orientation program.

cert5.title: IT Orientation Program - General
cert5.description: Gained basic knowledge of banking technologies, corporate IT processes, and workflows.

cert6.title: SQL Course: From Zero to Expert
cert6.description: Acquired fundamental and advanced skills in SQL database management, data analysis, relational structures, and query optimization.

cert7.title: Job Club Participation Certificate
cert7.description: Learned job search processes, career planning, interview techniques, and workplace success strategies.

cert8.title: Complete Java Developer Course (42 Hours)
cert8.description: Learned Java programming from scratch to advanced, including OOP and application development practices.

cert9.title: C# Programming Language: All Levels
cert9.description: Learned C# from beginner to advanced, developing console and Windows applications with practical exercises.

cert10.title: Corporate Project Development in .NET
cert10.description: Gained knowledge and experience in enterprise-level project development using .NET architecture.

cert11.title: C Programming: From Zero to Advanced (25+ Hours)
cert11.description: Learned C programming with practical projects, including algorithm development and memory management.

cert12.title: Design Patterns
cert12.description: Learned to apply design patterns to solve recurring software development problems and improve code quality.

resume.title: Resume
resume.school1Desc: Fatsa Anatolian High School, Fatsa / ORDU
resume.workDesc1: I work as a Part-Time Full Stack Developer at Architecht, a 100% subsidiary of Kuveyt T√ºrk, within the Tekno Campus program. I actively participate in corporate projects on both frontend (React) and backend (C#, ASP.NET Core), contributing to the UI and business logic layers.
resume.workDesc2: Currently working with C#, React, JavaScript, and SQL Server; improving my technical skills by gaining hands-on experience on real projects. I play an active role in agile sprints within the team.
resume.project1Desc: A system developed to monitor students' information, absenteeism, and academic performance.
resume.project1Techs: Technologies used: ASP.NET Core, MVC Framework, Microsoft SQL Server, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap
resume.project2Desc: A robotics system developed using ROS (Robot Operating System), working on basic motion commands, sensor data processing, and autonomous tasks. Tested in simulation environment.
resume.project2Techs: Technologies used: ROS (Noetic), Python, Gazebo, RViz
resume.project3Desc: A segmentation model trained to identify different customer groups by analyzing customer data. K-means algorithm used for segmenting, followed by visualization and interpretation.
resume.project3Techs: Technologies used: Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib, Seaborn
resume.interest1Desc: Hiking, camping, spending time in the village, and participating in outdoor activities.
resume.interest2Desc: Exploring new places, joining social events, and spending time together.
resume.interest3Desc: Playing strategy, FPS, and adventure games, and exploring the gaming world.
